metadata.title: USN-6128-1 -- CUPS vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that CUPS incorrectly handled logging. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause CUPS to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6128-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libcups2-dev - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.2 cups-bsd - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.2 cups-common - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.2 cups-core-drivers - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.2 cups-server-common - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.2 libcupsimage2 - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.2 cups-client - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.2 cups-ipp-utils - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.2 libcups2 - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.2 cups-ppdc - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.2 cups - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.2 libcupsimage2-dev - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.2 cups-daemon - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.2 No subscription required
